root: ^"It's time to get up Mr. Ferring, we're behind schedule on your rehabilitation", a stress filled, yet somehow disinterested, voice beyond your dream informs you. You've had trouble remembering your dreams lately, and this morning was no different.

bonud_introduction: ^He sighs. "Always the same shit with you discombined patients... I am Bonud"
bonud_amnesia_introduction: ^He sighs. "Always the same shit with you discombined patients... This is asylum
